snippet: Early adopters can try the new messaging app and improved photo software, and they can help the tech giant fix problems before the full release in the fall....
abstract: Apple unveils early version of its next mobile operating system, iOS 10, which will make significant changes to iPhones and iPads; beta release is meant for Apple developers to discover and stomp out bugs ahead of its main release in fall; advice provided to early adopters.
lead_paragraph: Early adopters can try the new messaging app and improved photo software, and they can help the tech giant fix problems before the full release in the fall.

headline.main: Apple’s iOS 10 Is Available for Beta Testers Who Want a Head Start
headline.print_headline: Apple’s iOS 10 Is Available for Beta Testers Who Want a Head Start
